subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Women
lead_paragraph: With a 17-0 record and a margin of victory of 24.8 points a game, the Connecticut Huskies have done little to disprove that they are the No. 1 women’s basketball team in the country.
snippet: With a 17-0 record and a margin of victory of 24.8 points a game, the Connecticut Huskies have done little to disprove that they are the No. 1 women’s basketball team in the country.
